meanings.definition: The time of day between late morning and early afternoon.
meanings.sent1: During midmornings, the sun is high in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I like to take a walk in the park during midmornings.
meanings.sent3: Midmornings are perfect for a quick snack break.
meanings.sent4: The hustle and bustle of midmornings remind me of a busy ant colony.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful midmornings always bring a sense of calm to my day.

meanings.definition: The period of time during the morning that falls between late morning and early afternoon.
meanings.sent1: My favorite part of the day is midmornings.
meanings.sent2: Midmornings are when I feel most productive.
meanings.sent3: During midmornings, the office is filled with the smell of fresh coffee.
meanings.sent4: The energy of midmornings is like a wave carrying me through the day.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of midmornings is unmatched by any other time of day.
